trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado com esse ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Minimiza a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que está no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> que está associado com o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado, expandido ou recolhido do controle que está associado a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado do controle que está associado a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The GetChildrenCore method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetChildrenCore retorna uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>objetos que representam o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>e os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>objetos que pertencem a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos filho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo de associado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: If the property of the is and patternInterface is the , , , or value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o propriedade o é e patternInterface é o , , , ou valor, esse método retorna um objeto que suporta o padrão de controle; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref> está fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> recolhido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Esta API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> permite que mais de um elemento filho a ser selecionado simultaneamente.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> requer pelo menos um elemento filho a ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>
